xtc.lang.cpp
Class ContextManager

java.lang.Object
  xtc.lang.cpp.ContextManager

public class ContextManager
extends Object

Conditional context manager. It abstracts away the nitty-gritty of using the BDD objects.

Version:
$Revision: 1.34 $

Nested Class Summary
 class ContextManager.Context
          A reference-counted context that automatically cleans up BDD when nothing references it anymore.
static class ContextManager.Variables
          Maps BDD variables and strings
